author: Shubhomoy Sikdar
text:
First, a video allegedly showing Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) members shouting pro-Pakistan slogans surfaces. Then they dismiss the video as morphed and seek investigation.

On Sunday, the ABVP issued a press release stating that the video titled The Conspiracy uploaded on social media was fake, and the ABVP approached the Cyber Cell. But it is alleged that the said cell is a private portal without investigative powers.
title: Video is fake, says ABVP
